name: pnp-list-formatting-horse-crests
title: Horse Crests
shortDescription: This sample illustrates some advanced techniques for applying theme colors to SVG elements, box-shadows, and borders. It also demonstrates using custom hover cards on complex elements (elements with children).
longDescription: This sample illustrates some advanced techniques for applying theme colors to SVG elements, box-shadows, and borders. It also demonstrates using custom hover cards on complex elements (elements with children).

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
